attributes.action: Make firework manufacturers reduce the decibel level of fireworks
attributes.additional_details: For so many years parliament has ignored pleas for stricter laws on the public having easy access to fireworks & when they do finally address it they just say they will "enforce" existing laws. Instead of being so combative, work with manufacturers to reduce/remove the excessive bangs that simulate bombs exploding, the decibel level has increased in recent years. This way the public can enjoy private displays & the vulnerable arent being terrified in their own homes for 3 months of the year.
attributes.background: Take accountability for irresponsible people having such easy access to fireworks that reach upto 120db, who blatantly flout the law in which they can set off these fireworks with 0 consequence & work with the public/manufacturers to reduce the excessive & unnecessary decibel levels in fireworks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758
